resources.string: Tryk for at skjule alle åbne bobler
Link Bubble er ikke i stand til at dele dette, da det ikke er en gyldig URL.
Kan ikke finde applikationen. Overvej at ændre boble handling via indstillinger.
Link Bubble er valgt som standardbrowser.
Bruges, når en eller flere ikke-browser apps på dit system kan håndtere en URL.\n\nTryk at fjerne en standard.

Bruges, når en eller flere ikke-browser apps på din enhed kan håndtere en URL, du kan konfigurere standard appen til at indlæse sådanne links med.\n\nDen standard app der bruges i denne sammenhæng er konfigureret, når du indlæser links med Link Bubble.
Omdiriger accounts.google.com links til sekundær browser
Link Bubble skal vælges som standard system browser for at fungere. Tryk for at konfigurere.
Bemærk: Begrænsningen på at opfange links fra blot én app, kun findes med den gratis version af Link Bubble. Opgrader til Pro?
Vis genvej til at indlæse video(r) på YouTube appen.
Bemærk: Aktuelle bobler vil blive genindlæst med den nye tekst zoom \"OK\".
Ny tekst zoom niveau anvendt. Genindlæser nuværende bobler...
Forhindre lagring af alle historik og cookies
Synes du om Link Bubble? Overvej at skriv en anmeldelse på Play Butik.
Opgrader til Pro for flere funktioner
Synes du om Link Bubble? Hvorfor så ikke tjekke mine andre apps ud?
Fjern %1$s som standard app til at indlæse %2$s links med?\n\nBemærk: Du kan vælge en ny standard app, næste gang du indlæser et %2$s link.
Android-systemets begrænsninger forhindrer Link Bubble, fra at vælge dette element.\nÅbn linket i %1$s?
Android-systemets begrænsninger forhindrer Link Bubble, fra at vælge dette element.\nÅbn linket i en browser.
Link typen understøttes ikke i øjeblikket. Åbn webside i %1$s?
Link typen understøttes ikke i øjeblikket. Åbn linket i en browser.
Link typen understøttes ikke i øjeblikket.
Android-systemets begrænsninger forhindrer drop down elementer, fra at fungere i Link Bubble.\nÅbn i %1$s?
Android-systemets begrænsninger forhindrer drop down elementer, fra at fungere i Link Bubble.\nÅbn linket i en browser.
Kunne ikke hente information om YouTube videoer på dette tidspunkt. Prøv venligst igen senere.
Slet hele din Link Bubble browser historik?
Private data ryddet. Genindlæser nuværende bobler...
User Agent ændret. Genindlæser nuværende bobler...
Din kopi af Link Bubble er blevet ulovligt ændret, og vil dermed vil ikke fungere pålideligt. Geninstaller fra Play Butik.
Link Bubble Pro er nødvendigt for at indlæse mere end en boble ad gangen. Opgrader til Pro?
Gyldig Link Bubble Pro licens opdaget.\nTak for at støtte dette projekt, og nyd appen :)
Ingen standard browser fundet på systemet.
Hvordan kan jeg hurtigt lukke en fane?
Ved at trykke på knappen Tilbage er den hurtigste måde. Træk fanen til knappen Luk er en anden god måde.
Jeg synes knappen Tilbage, bør minimere browser!

Minimering af Link Bubble, når der trykkes på Tilbage knappen ikke er mulig. Overvej følgende tilfælde:
1). example.com/page1 er indlæst i den første fane.
2). Du klikker på et link på denne side, og indlæser example.com/page2 i samme fane.
3). Du ønsker nu at gå tilbage til linket i trin 1.

Hvordan gør du det, hvis du minimerer Link Bubble når du trykker på Tilbage knappen? Hvis et tryk på den lille tilbage indikator på fanen ikke er mulig.

Link Bubble er en browser og Android browsere, har for længst etableret en standard af enten at gå tilbage i webadressen stakken, eller hvis der ikke findes en stak, lukke den aktuelle side, når der trykkes på knappen Tilbage. Link Bubble følger denne standard.

Der er tre årsager til dette:
1). En anden browser end Link Bubble, er angivet som din standard system browser. Se \"Indstil standard system browser \" i Link Bubble\'s Indstillinger for at ændre dette.
2). Den gratis version af Link Bubble opfanger kun links fra en enkelt app. Se \"Opfang links fra\" i Link Bubble\'s indstillinger for at se hvilke programmer det er, eller at ændre det. Bemærk, at ved at opgradere til Link Bubble Pro, vil links blive opfanget fra alle ikke-browser apps.
3). Apps såsom Talon, Reddit is Fun og andre har indbyggede browsere. Kontrollér indstillingerne i disse app og aktiver \"Ekstern browser\" eller fravælg \"Integreret browser\" eller lignende.

Bemærk: Andre browser apps, såsom Chrome er hardcodede at indlæse links i sig selv, og dermed er Link Bubble ikke i stand at indlæse links fra andre browser apps.
Vil du tilføje understøttelse af bogmærker, favoritter, udvidelser mv.?
Aldrig sige aldrig, men for nu er Link Bubble fokuseret udelukkende på, at være den bedst mulige måde for at indlæse links fra andre apps.
Hvornår vil du tilføje oversættelser til andre sprog? Kan jeg hjælpe?

Jeg håber at tilføje oversættelse support snart.

Når jeg gør det, vil jeg helt sikkert lave et indlæg på Google+ (+Chris Lacy) for at få hjælp med oversættelser, så sørg for at holde øje med mit feed.
Har du en køreplan for kommende funktioner? Kan jeg komme med foreslag til kommende funktioner?
Af konkurrencemæssige årsager er svaret på begge spørgsmål \'nej\' desværre.
Jeg har ikke et kreditkort og/eller jeg kan ikke købe fra Google Play. Hvordan køber jeg Pro?

Link Bubble understøtter kun køb via Google Play på dette tidspunkt.

Yderligere betalingsmetoder vil forhåbentlig blive tilføjet i fremtiden (forudsat at de ikke overtræder Programpolitikker for udviklere i Google Play).
Hvorfor kan jeg ikke skrive navnet på det link, jeg ønsker at besøge?

Dette er helt efter hensigten. Link Bubble er designet til ikke at være en komplet erstatning for din browser, men i stedet til at indlæse og vise links fra andre apps så elegant, hjælpsomt og så hurtigt som muligt.

Hvis du ønsker at indlæse en ny URL i Link Bubble, kan en søgning i Google Nu og indlæsning af resultatet med Link Bubble, være en fantastisk måde at gøre det.

For hurtig indlæsning af dine favoritter, kan Chrome Bogmærker widget være meget nyttigt.
Why don\'t drop down menus work?

Unfortunately Android system limitations prevent this from working.

Technical answer: Android\'s WebView hardcodes <select> elements to display via a Dialog, which cannot be launched from a Service. WebView does not provide a means of overriding this behavior. Thus a hack has been added to simply disable drop down items from all pages in Link Bubble. This is far from ideal, but it is certainly better than having the app crash, which is what happens otherwise :\\
Why can\'t I copy text from a web page?

Unfortunately Android system limitations prevent this from working.

Technical answer: Copy functionality works when using Android\'s WebView from an Activity, but not from a Service (which Link Bubble uses).
Why doesn\'t the app draw over the translucent status bar?
Unfortunately Android system limitations prevent this.
Is there a beta programme? How can I join?
Details on the beta programme will be announced in due course. Keep an eye on my Google+ (+Chris Lacy) feed for announcements.
Why does Link Bubble run slowly on my Nexus S / Galaxy S1 / Moto G class device?

Link Bubble is a very resource intensive app, and consequently devices with lower specs can struggle to run the app as well as more powerful devices. Future updates will aim to improve Link Bubble\'s performance, but there is only so much that can realistically be done here.

Technical answer: At the bare minimum, Link Bubble requires the use of a Service and a WebView in order to function. Often multiple WebViews and even multiple Activities are also present. Naturally, allocating these items (especially the WebViews) consumes a lot of memory/resources. Lower spec devices generally have less memory available than Link Bubble requires, and thus performance suffers as garbage collections are frequently triggered. As an example, the max heap size on the Nexus S is 48MB, compared to 192MB on the Nexus 5.
Sometimes webpages don\'t display correctly or videos don\'t play.

LinkBubble uses the standard Android WebView, but unfortunately it is sometimes unreliable. Alternative web rendering methods such as FireFox\'s GeckoView and Chromium will likely be investigated going forward.

In the event a webpage doesn\'t display correctly in Link Bubble, the easiest thing to do is just to load a traditional browser for that link.
Why does the ongoing notification always display when Link Bubble is running?
Unfortunately this ongoing notification is necessary to encourage the Android OS not to terminate Link Bubble.
When is the next update coming?

When it\'s ready!

It\'s not feasible to be any more specific than that unfortunately (even to provide a ballpark estimate).

The reality is, when estimates are given people often end up taking them as a commitment, and can get upset if/when a release slips for whatever reason.
Hvordan kan jeg hurtigt stoppe Link Bubble med at køre?
Stryg ned fra toppen af skærmen for at åbne notifikations panelet og klik på \"Link Bubble\" notifikationen.
Hvordan kan jeg fjerne Link Bubble som standardbrowser?
Systemindstillinger -> Applikationer -> Downloads -> Link Bubble -> Ryd standarder.
Hvordan fungerer Link Bubble Pro trial?

• For the first 24 hours after Link Bubble is installed, non-Link Bubble Pro users will have access to all of Pro\'s premium features (multiple tabs, links being intercepted from any app, etc.).
• During this one-time trial period, Link Bubble Pro\'s premium features will be available for all of your devices.
• A timer displays on the top-left of Link Bubble\'s main screen, informing you how much time remains in your trial.
• People who tried Link Bubble before the 1.1 update are eligible for the trial period.
• For verification purposes, the Pro trial is linked to your email address. If no email address is found on the device, the trial period won\'t be available.
• Sorry, but your trial period can\'t be reset. Please enjoy full access to Pro\'s features in the first 24 hours after installing Link Bubble.
%1$s tilbage af din 24 timers Link Bubble Pro trial.
By continuing, you acknowledge that you accept the Link Bubble terms and privacy policy.

Unable to verify license.

Some causes of this problem include:
 • There is no Internet connection.
 • This application has been tampered with.

Check your Internet connection, and if necessary, try installing the app from the Play Store again.
Link Bubble Pro purchase verified!\n\nThank you so much for supporting me as I develop this project.

Google Play is reporting this copy of Link Bubble Pro is unlicensed.\n\nAssuming you have indeed purchased a copy of Link Bubble Pro, the most common reason for this is that email address used for your purchase is not configured with the Play Store on this device.

Note: you don\'t need to load Link Bubble Pro again, but you do need to keep it installed for verification purposes.\n\nThis app will be hidden throughout the system so it doesn\'t appear in your launcher(s).
Link Bubble is an all-new browser designed and crafted solely with mobile devices in mind.

Features include: • When you click on a link in an app, Link Bubble loads that webpage in the background, leaving you free to keep using your current app rather than your precious time being wasted watching a page load. Once the page has fully loaded, it will animate on screen. • Link Bubble\'s flick physics allow you to go from clicking a link to sharing a link or adding it to a service such as Pocket in little more than a second! • Load multiple links from your current app at the same time (requires Pro). • Gracefully handles links that redirect to other apps. No longer does clicking an Instagram link in Twitter redirect to a full screen browser before loading Instagram! • Deep integration with the apps on your system. • Locates embedded YouTube videos on web pages, and provides a shortcut to load those videos directly in the YouTube app. • Handy stats that illustrate how much time you are saving by using Link Bubble.

Regarding the Location permission: This is required so that you might grant permission for a website to access your location (such as those with an embedded map). Link Bubble itself never accesses your location.
Link Bubble Pro unlocks the full feature set of Link Bubble.

Upgrades include: • Infinite number of tabs (free version is limited to just one tab). • Load links from all apps on your device (free version intercepts links from just one app). • Remove the upgrade incentives throughout the free version. • Support me so I get to make more of these apps :)
Note: For the first 24 hours after first installing Link Bubble, you will have access to all of Link Bubble Pro\'s premium features as a one-time trial.
Click a link in an app.
A bubble will appear on the edge of the screen and the link will begin loading in the background. As soon as the page is loaded, it will be displayed.
It\'s that simple! With Link Bubble, you can keep using your current app rather than wasting your time watching links redirect and waiting for pages to load. What\'s not to love about that?
You can also quickly share a link or add it to an app such as Pocket:
Looks both fun and useful right?
Redirects links to a dedicated app (E.g., Instagram).
Finds embedded videos so you can easily load them in the YouTube app.
The free version gives you a taste of Link Bubble\'s power, but with Pro you can:
Help ensure I am able to write more apps in the future :)
PS. To close this bubble, either press the Back button or long press the bubble and flick it onto the Close bubble.
